description:
Scroll side-to-side and shift
back-to-front in Kirby: Triple Deluxe,
only on Nintendo 3DS family systems!
Discover hidden depths as Kirby leaps
in and out of the background to
explore new areas, solve puzzles and
dodge enemies. But beware, bad guys
lie in wait both before and behind you,
and they can attack from all
directions!
name: Kirby™: Triple Deluxe
